itemize.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to make a list and give details about each thing on the list
itemize.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to present information in the form of a list, giving details about each item on the list
itemize.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The report itemized several areas of concern.
Taxpayers who don’t itemize  (=don’t give a detailed list of all their expenses) receive a standard deduction.
